item.description:
@messing_with_java wrote:

go into the characters file at the top of all your server files click on the person u want and change their xp and hp lvl to whatever you want it to be

item.title: On start
item.dc:creator: @sonjichan sonjichan
item.description:
@sonjichan wrote:

Wish I knew what to tell you about the HP, but I know so very little about editting players.

However hereâ€™s how you change the starting armor.

Go into player.java and search for:

//Giving the player a unique look

And editing these ID codes underneath to your satisfaction.

	[code]//Giving the player a unique look
	playerEquipment[playerHat]=2635;
	playerEquipment[playerCape]=3777;
	playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=6585;
	playerEquipment[playerChest]=4101;
	playerEquipment[playerShield]=6524;
	playerEquipment[playerLegs]=4103;
	playerEquipment[playerHands]=2912;
	playerEquipment[playerFeet]=2904;
	playerEquipment[playerRing]=-1;
	playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1;
	playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=4151;[/code]

Read full topic
